name: THE DEFENDER (MaxyDev, FroggyDevv)
description:
Controls

WASD - Move

Right Click - Aim Down Sights

Left Click - Shoot

Left Shift – Sprint

ESC or P - Pause Menu

If the game isn't running well for you in the browser and you wish to play outside of the browser download the ZIP file below, unzip the file and Run the exe! Happy Gaming!

You are THE DEFENDER!

Prepare to be put through a Trial of Judgment from the gods! Fight alongside your hero in the depths of the arena or assist from above! Use your Sniper to HEAL your Allies and DEFEAT your Foe! Devastating damage and healing compared to a warm hug on a winters morning, Defend your Friends while they’re put to the test in the Ultimate Judgment Fight!

The Heroes John "The Warbringer" Smith

Adept in various defensive tactics capable of withstanding great amounts of power. Where he lacks in striking power he makes up for in sheer resistance from all forms of attack.

Adam "Mercury" Brown

Gains the nickname from the Roman God of Speed, "Mercury" has been trained in evasive and swift movement whilst being able to output vicious and piercing damage to all foe he's matched with.

Bob "The Imbecile" Johnson

Truly doesn’t know why he's here, commonly seen running from enemies rather than fighting, not the greatest combatant, but will be there for you when no one else is <3

Game Jam

This made was created as a submission to the "Fam Jam 5"! The themes that were given to the entrants were "The Second One" and "Dead Giveaway". We liked the first theme a lot more because it allowed us to get creative with ideas! We decided to center our game around being the "Second Player" or the Support character, your job is to support the hero! Thank you everyone who plays the game <3

Known Issues

- Game is known to run poorly on Opera GX or Without Hardware Acceleration enabled.

- Game can run bad on poor Wi-Fi connection or overloaded network

- Game is prone to being very loud on some browsers
